name: pinap-berry
effect: No effect; only useful for planting and cooking.
short_effect: Used for creating PokéBlocks and Poffins.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Used to make Pokéblocks that will enhance your Toughness. Its yellow flesh is sour when eaten.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Used to make Pokéblocks that will enhance your Toughness. Its yellow flesh is sour when eaten.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A Berry that makes you slightly more likely to get an item when it’s given to Pokémon you’re trying to catch.
